virtual-sensor.name: Jungfraujoch_Dozer_NodeHealth__chart4
virtual-sensor.description: backlog health status at Jungfraujoch deployment

address.predicate: select timed, POSITION, GENERATION_TIME, SDIVOLTAGE from Jungfraujoch_Dozer_NodeHealth__conv__1950

source.query: select GENERATION_TIME, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 1, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p1, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 2, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p2, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 3, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p3, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 4, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p4, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 5, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p5, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 6, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p6, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 7, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p7, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 8, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p8, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 9, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p9, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 10, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p10, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 11, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p11, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 12, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p12, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 13, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p13, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 14, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p14, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 15, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p15, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 16, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p16 from wrapper where GENERATION_TIME >= (DATEDIFF(second, '1970-01-01', NOW()) * 1000) - 604800000
